name: Voice of World
briefDescription: Voice of World is a multi-unit non-profit Social Welfare Organisation for the handicapped especially the visually challenged students.Its core activities are mainstreaming the handicapped especially the sightless and partially sighted students from Kindergarten to Masters Degree and arranging their social rehabilitation. Its core competence is to render institutional services to its handicapped students according to individual needs.The mission of Voice of World is to challenge discrimination and exclusion by providing opportunities for people with visual impairment and other disabilities to learn, live and work independently. The organisation achieves its mission by providing education, training and imparting a wide range of life skills.
